text:
STATE UNIVERSITY OF IOWA
JU
IOWA CITY
February 14, 1961
Television Center
William G. Harley
NAEB
Suite 1119
DuPont Circle Office Building
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
Please excuse the delay in responding to your letter of February 1. I
would be pleased to accept the chairmanship of this committee again,
though I am somewhat chagrined by the fact that, in my opinion, we made
no contribution to the NAEB last year. I hope that we can this year.
This suggested committee is fine with me. Sherk is the only one whom
I do not know.
By the way, have you had a chance yet to think over the suggestions
(involving the research committee) which I sent to you? If so, do you
have any reactions? In addition to, or instead of, these, are there
other contributions which you are hoping for from the committee in 1961?
See you in Washington one of these days.
Cordially,
Samuel L. Becker
Director, Division of
Television-Radio-Film
SLB:ks
